_sText:
This is my first ever COMPLETED map.

I make maps a LOT but I never really complete them OR upload them. So after I talked with Shirk from FPSBanana about mapping, I decided to give it a good shot. 

So, this is a Gungame map, it uses the default DEV textures from VALVe, a few custom DEV textures from Chris528, and a custom skybox from GFLOW. Links available below.

=============FEATURES==============
 
*2 open towers on opposite sides of the map, entrances blocked by UNbreakable glass walls. (NOTE: the towers are tall and hollow but you cant reach the top and theres no platforms or multiple stories inside because in a gungame map that wouldnt make much sense :| )

*2 stories, the main level then a lower level with edges protected by player_clip so you can stare off the edge at the bottom of the skybox

*Half circle hiding spots

*Spawnpoints so that you can add buyzones or whatever you want, to the raw file and play whatever you want.

*Lighting that suits the skybox

*Custom FPSBanana logo clearly visible on the front of one of the towers (NOTE: The FPSBanana logo will be added to FPSBanana so you can position it in your maps :D But if you use it, could you please give me credit? Because it was a bit of work creating it :D

===============LINKS================

46 dev texture pack by Chris528
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/707


flowsky04 by G-FLOW
http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/996
